restarter.partial_crash_warn: Debido a una caída parcial, este servidor se reiniciará  en 1 minuto. Favor desconectarse.
restarter.partial_crash_warn_discord: Debido a una caída parcial, **%{servername}**este servidor se reiniciará  en 1 minuto.
restarter.schedule_warn: El servidor se va a reiniciar en %{smart_count} minuto. Favor desconectarse. |||| El servidor se va a reiniciar en %{smart_count} minutos.
restarter.schedule_warn_discord: **%{servername}** El servidor se va a reiniciar en %{smart_count} minutos. |||| **%{servername}** El servidor se va a reiniciar en %{smart_count} minutos.

ban_messages.kick_temporary: (%{author}) You have been banned from this server for "%{reason}". Your ban will expire in: %{expiration}.
ban_messages.kick_permanent: (%{author}) You have been permanently banned from this server for "%{reason}".
ban_messages.drop_temporary:
You have been banned from this server.
Your ban will expire in: %{expiration}.
Ban ID: %{id}.
Ban Reason: %{reason}.
Banned by: %{author}.
ban_messages.drop_permanent:
You have been permanently banned from this server.
Ban ID: %{id}.
Ban Reason: %{reason}.
Banned by: %{author}.

nui_warning.title: ADVERTENCIA
nui_warning.instruction: Presione [SPACE] durante 10 segundos para descartar este mensaje.
